channel.title: Posts on Teetotality
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Teetotality

item.title: Why IPFS
item.description: I wrote here how this blog is built. The better question - thanks Aman! - is why? Why not post on medium, or put a static site on github pages or an S3 bucket, or use a virtual private server, or even go super old-school and run a web server at home (I do have this sweet, sweet Sonic fiber after all). And, just to get this out of the way, part of the reason I did it this way is because I am a huge nerd, and this technology is new, and interesting, and I wanted to.

item.title: How This Blog Was Made
item.description: You know you want to read this, nerd.

item.title: Think Do Build
item.description: Aristotle, man - dude was smart. How I learned to stop worrying and divide my intellectual life into three pieces.

item.title: Hello, World. All Of It.
item.description: This is the beginning of something all-encompassing.
